template.template: SNMP Tape Library Oracle StorageTek SL150
template.name: SNMP Tape Library Oracle StorageTek SL150
template.description:
## Description
Based on MIB File: STREAMLINE-TAPE-LIBRARY-MIB Created by Samuel Martins https://github.com/slunart/ https://www.linkedin.com/in/slmartins/ 2020-04-19 Version 1.0
## Overview
Hello, I created this template to monitor the Oracle StorageTek SL150 Modular Tape Library equipment ((www.oracle.com/br/storage/tape-storage/sl150-modular-tape-library/) via SNMP agent. I used as a base the MIB called "STREAMLINE-TAPE-LIBRARY-MIB" and validated it on an SL 150 device. This template is likely to work partially on other Oracle Tape Library as on the SL 500 version.
This template is also available on GitHub: https://github.com/slunart/Zabbix-Templates/tree/master/Oracle
If you find any inconsistencies in the template, please let me know that I will try to improve it.
Best regards,
Samuel Martins
## Author
Samuel Martins

item.name: Agent Ha Alternate Ip
item.description: alternate RE controller's IP address

item.name: Agent Ha identifier
item.description: RE controller identifier. active=0, standby=1

item.name: slAgentHaSlot
item.description: RE controller slot. sideA=0, sideB=1

item.name: Agent Ha State
item.description: RE controller state. simplex=0, duplex(switchable)=1

item.name: Total of Caps
item.description: Count of the CAPs in the CAP table

item.name: Total of Cells
item.description: Count of the storage elements in the cell table

item.name: Number of Available Cells
item.description: Number of available (empty) storage cells in the library

item.name: Number of Available Restricted Cells
item.description: Number of available restricted (empty) storage cells in the library

item.name: Total of Controllers
item.description: Count of the controllers in the controller table

item.name: Total of Drives
item.description: Count of the drives in the drive table

item.name: Total of Elevators
item.description: Count of the elevators in the elevator table

item.name: Total of Fans
item.description: Number of monitored fans in the library

item.name: Clean Enabled
item.description: Auto clean feature configuration. Not all libraries support this feature, please refer to user documentation.

item.name: Total of Clean Cartridges
item.description: Count of the clean cartridges in the library

item.name: Number of cartridge types supported
item.description: Number of unique cartridge types supported

item.name: City
item.description: Location/Site - city

item.name: Contact
item.description: The primary contact for administration

item.name: Country
item.description: Location/Site - country

item.name: Descr
item.description: Location/site - description/misc

item.name: State
item.description: Location/Site - state/province

item.name: Street
item.description: Location/Site - street address

item.name: Zip
item.description: Location/Site - zip code (or other data)

item.name: Total of LSM
item.description: The LSM Count

item.name: State
item.description: The statue of the library (online, offline)

item.name: Top Level Condition
item.description: The overall condition of the library (normal,degraded,not-operational)

item.name: Serial Number
item.description: The library frame serial number

item.name: Cumulative Machine Up Time in Seconds
item.description: Cumulative Machine Up Time in seconds

item.name: Number of Library Initializations
item.description: The number of library initializations

item.name: Number of Times The Service Door Has Been Opened
item.description: The number of times the service door has been opened

item.name: Total Number of Get Failures
item.description: The total number of get failures

item.name: Total Number of Get Retries
item.description: The total number of get retries

item.name: Total Number of Mounts
item.description: The total number of mounts

item.name: Total Number of Cartridge Moves
item.description: The total number of cartridge moves

item.name: Total Number of Put Failures
item.description: The total number of put failures

item.name: Total Number of Put Retries
item.description: The total number of put retries

item.name: UpTime Since Last Boot
item.description: In seconds

item.name: Base Model
item.description: The StorageTek Model Name - see slXXXX section for vendor specific model data

item.name: Boot Software/OS Version
item.description: The library's boot software/OS version

item.name: Firmware Build Date
item.description: The library's embedded firmware build date

item.name: Firmware Version
item.description: The library's embedded firmware version per EC field releases

item.name: Controller Hardware Version
item.description: The library's controller hardware version

item.name: WWN Number
item.description: The libraries WWN number

item.name: Total of Drives in the Drive Media Validation Table
item.description: Count of the drives in the drive Media Validation table

item.name: Total of Power Supplies
item.description: Number of power supplies installed in the library

item.name: Total of Ptp
item.description: Count of the pass-through ports in the library

item.name: Total of Robots
item.description: Count of the number of robots in the table

item.name: Total of Safety Door Center Completions
item.description: The safety door center completion count

item.name: Number of IPL's by the Safety Door
item.description: The number of IPL's performed by the Safety Door

item.name: Total of Safety Door Retries
item.description: The number of total Safety Door retries

item.name: Total of Tapes
item.description: Count of the cartridges in the inventory table

item.name: Total of Temperature Sensors
item.description: Number of temperature sensors in the library
